H0.text: towns on the border of texas and oklahoma. Wichita Falls

H1.text: towns on the border of texas and oklahoma. Altus

H2.text: towns on the border of texas and oklahoma. Childress

H3.text: towns on the border of texas and oklahoma. Texhoma

A4.text: Texhoma is a divided city, with the Texas-Oklahoma state border separating the city from Texhoma, Oklahoma.

A5.text: It is the only city in Texas where graduating students can attend either Texas or Oklahoma Universities and pay in-state tuition for either.
